headline: Uptrends review
description: Uptrends can run complex transaction workflows and monitor websites from more than 200 global regions. Read our review of Uptrends - a website monitoring tool.
negativeNotes: Feature organization is unintuitive, UI is confusing
positiveNotes: Raise alerts via phone call and SMS
A large number of check locations available
Sensitive data can be stored separately from tests

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Website monitoring tool
reviewBody: Uptrends is a website monitoring tool that supports complex transaction workflows. It uses real browsers to perform full page checks that can track individual elements on the page. Uptrends also has over 220 check locations around the world, which makes it one of the most geographically diverse monitoring tools we tested.
